testcase.brief: Mapping Standard Radius Attribute to defined user group
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Auth type is 802.1x User group and upid attribute mapping is defined user-group student user-attribute 10 user-group teacher user-attribute 20 user-group staff user-attribute 30 User group mapping is enabled User group mapping attribute is default value User group name attribute is defined in radius server User2 belongs to group staff User profile with attribute equales user groupâ€™s attribute is defined user-profile any qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 11 attribute 1 user-profile student qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 110 attribute 10 user-profile teacher qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 120 attribute 20 user-profile staff qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 130 attribute 30 security-object test_so default-user-profile-attr 1
Test Procedure: 1: station connects to ap by account user2

step.console: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} security aaa radius-server primary ${pub.radius1.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret} acct-port ${pub.radius1.acctport}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} security protocol-suite wpa2-aes-8021x" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} security aaa user-profile-mapping enable" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile auto qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan2} attribute ${tb.vlan2}" -v "user-profile auto1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute ${tb.vlan1}" -v "user-profile auto2 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan3} attribute ${tb.vlan3}" -v "user-group student" -v "user-group student user-attribute ${tb.vlan1}" -v "user-group staff" -v "user-group staff user-attribute ${tb.vlan2}" -v "user-group teacher" -v "user-group teacher user-attribute ${tb.vlan3}"
